attributes.action: Scrap the Old State Pension.  All pensioners to receive the New State Pension.
attributes.additional_details:
The basic cost of living is the same for all pensioners.   A good proportion of older pensioners will not have private or works pensions and find living costs hard to manage.
No-one who has worked all their life should have to decide between heating or eating.
attributes.background: Pay the New State Pension to all pensioners eligible for a full state pension.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/728562
